Learn and start developing wordpress ECommerce Theme. More than 70 percent of websites on the internet runs on Wordpress. ECommerce themes are more demanding than any other theme. People are buying Wordpress themes more than ever and selling a wordpress theme can make you lots of money.

COURSE OVERVIEW

Installing Woocommerce

You will learn how to install woocommerce plugin. You will learn to make your blog theme woocommerce compatible and convert your simple blog theme into a fully functional ecommerce theme. Learn how to add dummy products data to your theme.

Custom Homepage

Forget about boring blog homepage of your wordpress theme and learn how to build your own custom homepage. Make your theme beautiful by integrating a slider in your theme

Add different product sections such as

  • Products Categories
  • Recent Products
  • Featured Products
  • Sale Products
  • Best Selling Products and
  • Top Rated Products

Footer

Design a three column mega footer. Insert Footer Logo and Contact Description in your footer. Integrate wordpress sidebars in your footer and get the freedom to use any wordpress widget in your theme footer. Insert copyright text and awesome looking Social icons in your theme footer

Theme Options Panel

Talking about WordPress Theme development, the first thing we hear from both the developers and the clients is theme options panel, as to a greater extent, the features of your theme rely on how efficiently you do this particular section. And when you are developing a theme to sell online, it becomes a crucial part.

You will learn to create your own Theme Options Panel and use it make your website's content Dynamic. These are the things that we will make dynamic in our theme

  • Website Logo
  • Website CSS
  • Homepage components
  • Footer Logo and Contact Us Description
  • Social Icons and Copyright Text

So, what are you waiting for ? Enroll Today!
title: Wordpress E-Commerce Theme Development
